query: technical documentation with various formatting challenges

items.text: API ENDPOINT: GET /api/v1/users - Returns list of all users with pagination support and filtering capabilities.
authentication: bearer token required | rate limiting: 1000 requests/hour | response format: json
ERROR_CODES: 400 (Bad Request), 401 (Unauthorized), 403 (Forbidden), 404 (Not Found), 500 (Internal Server Error)
~~DEPRECATED~~ This endpoint is no longer supported and will be removed in v2.0. Use /api/v2/users instead.

EXAMPLE REQUEST:
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer TOKEN" https://api.example.com/v1/users?page=1&limit=10

notes: deprecated content marked as junk due to obsolescence

items.text: FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENT FR-001: User registration system shall support email validation and password strength checking.
Non-functional: System must handle 1000 concurrent users with <2 second response time during peak hours.
Security req: Data encryption at rest and in transit | GDPR compliance | User consent management | Audit logging
UI/UX Guidelines: - Responsive design - Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA) - Mobile-first approach - Brand consistency
[DRAFT] Integration requirements pending stakeholder approval and technical feasibility assessment [NOT FINAL]

notes: draft requirements lack finalization and approval
